biotools.summary:
Harnessing Multi-View Perspective of Light Fields for Low-Light Imaging.

Light Field (LF) offers unique advantages such as post-capture refocusing and depth estimation, but low-light conditions, especially during night, severely limit these capabilities.

bioschemas.name: L3Fnet
